```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(Cairo)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(dev="CairoPNG")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width=12, fig.height=8) 
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path = "figures/")

source("manha_visualization.R")

chr7_data = as.data.table(read.table("../_ignore/tcrb_vgene_oof_hg19_pvals.tsv", header = TRUE))
```


```{r echo=TRUE}
productivity = c("productive", "NOT_productive")
trimming_types = c("v_trim", "d0_trim", "d1_trim", "j_trim", "dj_insert")

for (trim in trimming_types) {
    for (prod in productivity) {
        compile_data_manhattan(chr7_data, prod, trim)
    }
}
```
